name: Flip Box
description:
Flip Box is a dynamic maze game in which players control and navigate a moving three-dimensional labyrinth in real time. With 12 levels of tossing and turning inside a massive box, the simple goal of making it to the finish line in the center might not be as straightforward as it appears.

System recommendations: 2.4GHz processor,  4GB RAM, 300MB disk space.  I am unsure of the exact system requirements, so I recommend test-driving the FREE DEMO before purchasing. It has all the functionality of the full game, just with fewer levels. Download Free Demo or Full Version below!

This is my first time developing, so feedback is welcome.

Warning: might be disorienting to some players.

For more DGC shenanigans, check out our website!

http://dovergamingcompany.weebly.com
